text: École nationale supérieure d'informatique pour l'industrie et l'entreprise (National School of Computer Science for Industry and Business) is a renowned graduate engineering school in France. It is in a campus of the University of Paris-Saclay (Northern France, associate member).Members and associates Its different curricula lead to the following French & European degrees : * Ingénieur ENSIIE (ENSIIE Graduate engineer Masters level program) * Master of Science. Academic activities and industrial applied research are performed mainly in French and English languages. Students from a dozen of nationalities participate to the different curricula at ENSIIE.L’ENSIIE : LE ‘FRENCH ENGINEERING’ AU COEUR DE L’INFORMATIQUE Most of the 500 graduate engineer students at ENSIIE live in dedicated residential buildings nearby research labs and metro public transports. == Research labs == Research activities at École nationale supérieure d'informatique pour l'industrie et l'entreprise relate to the following topics: *Statistics and Genome *Computer and communication *Biology and complex systems *Analysis and probability *Image sciences *Biotechnology and genetics == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in France Category:1968 establishments in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Strasbourg Category:1960s establishments in France Category:Évry-Courcouronnes
title: École nationale supérieure d'informatique pour l'industrie et l'entreprise
